Question
========
Consider a study about the effects of listening to Christmas songs on feelings of happiness. Participants are asked on how many days in the past week they have listened to Christmas songs. What are the characteristics of this variable measuring Christmas songs listening behavior?

Answerlist
----------
* Numerical and ordinal.
* Categorical and ordinal.
* Numerical and interval/ratio.
* Categorical and interval/ratio.
